titleStmt.title: An explanation of the Lord Treasurer's letter to Mr. Montagu, the Kings late embassador in France, March 25th, 1678 together vvith the said letter and the two letters of Mr. Montagu, which were read in the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Leeds, Thomas Osborne, Duke of, 1631-1712.
Montagu, Ralph Montagu, Duke of, 1638?-1709.

notesStmt.note: "The Lord Treasurer's letter to Mr. Montagu ... March 25th, 1678" signed: Danby.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
